summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4608 for the improvement of 50th Avenue South, from Genesee Street to Lake Washington Boulevard; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53631, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
